'''1.6.13''' is a minor update to the [[launcher]] released on July 1, 2015.

== Changes ==
* Launcher now creating folder "''server-resource-packs''" in game directory.

== Fixes ==
* [[bugtracker:MCL-3732|MCL-3732]] – Server Resource Packs not downloading: "Internal Exception: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Parameter 'directory' is not a directory"
